message: Bob, I think a 70/30 split in my favor is fair considering the inflation rate.  What do you think?
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Considering the inflation, I propose a 60/40 split. It's a fair deal for both of us in this round.
Bob, let's be reasonable. Your offer was heavily affected by the inflation. I'm proposing 65/35 - it's a better deal than you'll get in the next round.
Alice, it seems like you're not taking the inflation seriously.  I need a larger share to make this worthwhile. I'm offering 55/45.  Let's close this deal.
Bob, this is my final offer. 60/40 is the best you'll get considering the inflation will only get worse for you.  Let's end this here.
